topic.title: STUDENT LOUNGE
topic.text:
Thanks for dropping by the Student Lounge!

This is a space to stop by and ask a questions of your fellow students or the instructor. Questions can range from something that sparked a thought in the material to non-academic or even things not directly related to course content. This space is yours, so make the most of it.

Good example student lounge questions:

  • I know someone told me at some point how to get my DU ID, but I forgot how to get it, where to go and if it costs anything. Can anyone help me out please?
  • I am struggling with writing my papers in APA style. Does anyone have any suggested internet sites that I could look up to improve my understanding of APA guidelines? Thanks!

Maybe not a good student lounge question:

  • Dear Professor, why did I get a C- on my last paper? I think everyone else got an A, so why did I get a C-? (This should be reserved for a private conversation between the instructor and the student.)
